channel.title: Making Object's Trobule
channel.description: Ive watched loads of videos on how to make them but i dont have MakeGlobalObject in my client.java . .. . .. Can Anyone help.... its a blank server

item.title: Making Object's Trobule
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

viking he kinda has a point… why do you have a blank source if you can’t even figure the fact that makeglobalobject is a void saved in many server’s client.java files. the fact you stereotype it to makeglobalobject is bs because it can be called anything providing it is told what to do (in this case add a global object) my advice before i help u, look at another server and tell me what you find…

–James–

Edit: sigh… My point being as follows: public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ if(person.heightLevel == 0){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}} got it now…? good now learn from this. (:

Read full topic
